valid_articles.Title: Oh, and here's my case study about redirects to non-relevant urls, and Google seeing those as soft 404s. Again, 404s are totally fine, and can be good. Don't blind redirect urls to categories, your homepage, etc.

The tweet emphasizes that using 404 errors is acceptable and often preferable to blindly redirecting URLs to irrelevant pages like category pages or the homepage.
